name: Ice Melt
description:
-ICE MELT-


★★★★★ www.AppleClan.com

"Polo’s icy world is a great looking place. The graphics in Ice Melt are, in a word, incredible. From the start up screen onwards they are impressive and as you progress through the levels they only seem to get better. Visually Ice Melt reminds me of a console platform game rather than an iPhone game, the graphics are really that good." AppleClan.com

★★★★ www.AppAdvice.com

"Ice Melt (Free) by Aeralas is an arcade game with a small penguin that loves to melt ice and bounce around. You’ll be moving downward at break neck speeds among a plethora of obstacles while trying to collect as many points as possible."


-FALL DOWN MEETS SUPER SPEED!!-

Fly or waddle through this pinball puzzle that is Ice Melt!

Polo is one Angry Penguin!

His ICE is melting! We find our furry penguin friend Polo on the edge of destruction. His land is melting, and he wants out. Buzz through the ten colorful strategy levels and find there are many surprises around every turn. Collect Diamonds in each level and race against the Clock!



FEATURES:

> High Resolution Retina Display Graphics!
> Addictive and ORIGINAL gameplay!
> Game Center Support!
> Ten Fully Engaging Levels!
> Addictive Replayability!
> The Simplest Game on the App Store!
> Strategy, Puzzle, Action, and SPEED!

Race for Time-Attack, High Score, or Exploration!

IMMERSIBLE RE-PLAYABLE LEVELS THAT WILL HAVE YOU EXPLORING FOR WEEKS!

NEW LEVELS PER MONTH!

FULL GAME SUPPORT - TEN EXPANSIVE PUZZLE LEVELS!

Cavern, Capped, Icicles, 'Drix, Vexxed, Valley, Zeust, Stars, Galactic, Finale!

ENJOY ICE MELT!
